# Such Ego (Wow)

This is a [Greener Grasses](https://chaoticiak.github.io/logic.html#greenergrasses) puzzle, created at the request of chaotic_iak, hence the theming.

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/suchEgoWow.png)](https://zwegner.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
